steps.name: Given I have configured to operator to observe the Namespace 'entando-k8s-operator-common-cmpr64-test99'
And I have configured to operator to have interest in the Namespace 'entando-k8s-operator-common-cmpr64-test992'
And I have created a ProvidedCapability 'my-capability1' with the label 'my-label=value1' in the Namespace 'entando-k8s-operator-common-cmpr64-test99'
And I have created a ProvidedCapability 'my-capability2' with the label 'my-label=value2' in the Namespace 'entando-k8s-operator-common-cmpr64-test992'
And I have logged in with an account that does not have access to the namespaces entando-k8s-operator-common-cmpr64-test992
Expect ProvidedCapability 'my-capability1' to be resolved using the label 'my-label=value1'
But expect no ProvidedCapability to be resolved using the label 'my-label=value2'

labels.name: feature
labels.value: As a support developer, I would like perform common operations on the ProvidedCapability resources through a simple interface to reduce the learning curve
